mapper.sql: f.f_measure_check_id, f.order_id, f.check_item, f.cdate, f.measure_data, e.emp_name,e.emp_id,f.result, f.note
mapper.select:
select
from final_measuret_check f LEFT JOIN employee e on f.emp_id=e.emp_id where f.f_measure_check_id = #{fMeasureCheckId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}

select
from final_measuret_check f LEFT JOIN employee e on f.emp_id=e.emp_id

select
from final_measuret_check f LEFT JOIN employee e on f.emp_id=e.emp_id where f.f_measure_check_id like #{id}

select
from final_measuret_check f LEFT JOIN employee e on f.emp_id=e.emp_id where f.order_id like #{id}
